Dedicated Maintenance engineer with 6+ years of experience and a degree in
engineering makes me the perfect fit for any company. 
Versatile and result oriented individual with thorough knowledge of all the kind of
equipment used in a company. 
A persistent performer skilled to perform en-number of high level tasks with
efficiency and effectively.
Industrial Experience
        
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
 
Previous Employer: AlQalzam Food Distinct Co Ltd., Jeddah., Saudi Arabia.
Al-Qalzam Food Distinguished Co. Ltd. (Limited Liability Company) was
founded in 07.09.2002. Where Al-Qalzam idea which inspired by the old name of the
(Red Sea) came to light in order to provide Seafood, derive its flavor and airspace
from Al-Qalzam Sea.
To be known that we are the first fish restaurant in the kingdom, and to set
new  standards  for  food  quality,  sophistication  of  service  and  to  provide  the
atmosphere of convenience for customers and employees.
Date:  July 20th ,2013 to July 20th 2016.
Designation: Maintenance Engineer
Roles and Responsibilities
        
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
 
Maintain the Resorts, Plants and Residence.
To check the Preventive Maintenance of All Equipments.
To check all the Electrical and Electronic Equipments, A/C and T/V
To check all the areas to maintain the cleanliness.
To check and visit all our branches.
Page 1 of 4

To check all the Games equipments in Games Park.
To check the Regular works like Water and Gas.
Co-ordination in all day to day activities.
Prepare daily report, remarks and equipment history.
Manpower planning and control.
Regular updating of stocks of spare materials for electrical maintenance.
Previous Employer: Cooper Bussmann India Pvt Ltd., Pondicherry., India.
An UK based 175 years old company pioneer in World class cutting edge 
technology & India's biggest and most modern fuse manufacturing facility.
Date:  December 1st, 2011 to 24th December, 2012.
Designation: Graduate Engineer Trainee
Roles and Responsibilities
        
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
 

Maintenance of material and material related equipments.

Co-ordination in all day to day activities.
Goods receipts, Goods issues of materials regularly updating as SAP stocks.
Create Purchase order for month, week and daily requirements basis as per planning.
Arranging materials from vendor as per purchase order.
Manpower planning for material location arranging and issues in stores.

Checking the materials stores in properly as per 5S concepts and hazardous materials
        keeps separately.    
Monthly cycle count taking for materials and adjusting the stocks.
Rejection materials return to vendor with proper documents.
Support to ISO 14001 & ISO 9001 & Document works.

Previous Employer: Ganges Internationale Pvt Ltd., Pondicherry., India.
GIPL started in 1991 manufacturers and supplies tower for telecommunication,
wind mills, power transmission and distribution and railway electrification.
Date:  June 1st, 2010 to November 30th 2011.
Designation: Trainee Electrical Engineer
Roles and Responsibilities
        
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
         
 
 
Planning and effecting preventive & predictive maintenance, overhauling, repair 
schedule of various machineries and instruments to increase machine up time and 
long term equipment reliability.
Under take periodic checking and maintenance of electrical machines, panels & 
switchgear.
Attend breakdowns in plant.
Conducts preventive maintenance as per planning. 
Prepare daily report, remarks and equipment history.
Manpower planning and control.
Regular updating of stocks of spare materials for electrical maintenance.
